text: Sudur Niharika (1976) is an Indian Bengali film directed by Sushil Mukherjee and produced by Anjana Bhattacharya. It stars Soumitra Chatterjee, Soma Dey, Sumitra Mukherjee, Dipti Roy Bikash Roy, Debashree Roy, Rabi Ghosh and Arindam Ganguly. Music of the film was composed by Manabendra Mukherjee with lyrics penned by Shyamal Gupta. == Cast== *Soumitra Chatterjee *Soma Dey *Sumitra Mukherjee *Dipti Roy *Bikash Roy *Debashree Roy *Rabi Ghosh *Arindam Ganguly == References == == External links == * Category:Bengali-language films Category:Indian films Category:1976 films Category:1970s Bengali-language films
title: Sudur Niharika
